attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Governments Green paper to continue to develop in flood plains is mind blowing in its stupidity. Climate change will increase the frequency of flooding; continual development in flood plains removes the natural flood management resource. The houses/business will not be able to get insurance. Maintaining flood defences in the long term is not sustainable.

The Government should take a strategic review of climate, flooding and development.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
